title: Colin.McRae.Rally.Remastered.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Colin.McRae.Rally.Remastered.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Year: 2014
Genre: Racing (Cars) / Simulator / Sport / 3D
Developer: Codemasters
Publisher: Codemasters
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus| Multi5
VoiceLanguage: Eng |Rus
Crack: SKIDROW




System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 1.6 GHz or AMD Equivalent
Memory: 2 GB
Video Card: Nvidia 6800 or ATI X1300 or Intel HD3000
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 1 GB


Game information:

Colin McRae Rally brings the exciting atmosphere of the European
Rally on the PC. Will learn how to control the car on the road
in a driving school where Colin McRae himself will teach you the
basics of this difficult case. After completing the course, you
can safely choose one of 12 racing cars and take part in this rally.
For those who want even more competition there is the Championship
mode. In it you will take part in competitions in eight countries,
including Australia and the Monte Carlo. If you are an ardent fan
of racing, be sure to play in the Colin McRae Rally.


Repack Features:

Colin McRae Rally Remastered
Do not cut / recoded
